topic_metadata.title: Why are the preview panel and button not shown?

posts.cooked:
I’ve been using typst for over a year and suddenly yesterday my preview panel got hidden and I can’t get it back. I tried deleting the cache and history, force quit safari and restarted my macbook. Nothing seems to fix the issue.
Attached a screenshot of a new empty document i created to show the problem.

Screenshot 2025-03-28 at 09.26.383456×1982 193 KB

As you can see the preview panel on the right is not there and the button to pop out the preview is also missing… :(
posts.raw:
I've been using typst for over a year and suddenly yesterday my preview panel got hidden and I can't get it back. I tried deleting the cache and history, force quit safari and restarted my macbook. Nothing seems to fix the issue. 
Attached a screenshot of a new empty document i created to show the problem.
![Screenshot 2025-03-28 at 09.26.38|690x395](upload://oaZ6RlVqPYray3RYdANqpurPQP1.png)

As you can see the preview panel on the right is not there and the button to pop out the preview is also missing... :(

posts.cooked: In the menu on the top go to View > Show both panels. It has to be selected to show both, the editor and the preview.
posts.raw: In the menu on the top go to `View > Show both panels`. It has to be selected to show both, the editor and the preview.

posts.cooked: Hahaha thanks that was an easy fix, I don’t know how that triggered because I never changed anything in those settings. But thanks!!! :)
posts.raw: Hahaha thanks that was an easy fix, I don't know how that triggered because I never changed anything in those settings. But thanks!!! :)
